text: Have you not seen those who were forbidden from secret talks, yet they ˹always˺ return to what they were forbidden from, conspiring in sin, aggression, and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you ˹O Prophet˺, they greet you not as God greets you, and say to one another, “Why does God not punish us for what we say?” Hell is enough for them—they will burn in it. And what an evil destination
